game.name: Batman™: Arkham Knight - 1st Appearance Batman Skin
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 1939년 Detective Comic #27에서 선보인 최초의 배트맨 수트를 갖춰 입으십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Don the iconic suit from Batman’s debut appearance in Detective Comics #27 in 1939.
